issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Geolocation is not working, in kitchen sink example for android.

Screen shot is attached, with this issue.
fields.summary: Android: Geolocation not working on Kitchen Sink, android version 2.3.3

comments.body: Unable to reproduce error 2.3.3 emulator for either Rhino or V8.  Will verify on device.
Verified correct behavior on 2.3 emulator and device.  This issue is due to using an older version of KitchenSink.  A fix for this issue was put in with timob-7442

Closing ticket as I am unable to reproduce the issue using the following environment; 
Pixel (7.1) 
MacOS 10.11.6 (15G31) 
Studio 4.8.1.201612050850 
Ti SDK 6.0.3 GA 
Appc NPM 4.2.8 
Appc CLI 6.1.0 
Ti CLI 5.0.11 
Alloy 1.9.5 
Arrow 1.10.1 
Xcode 8.2 (8C38) 
Node v4.6.0 
Java 1.7.0_80
